名称:Counter-Compare Control Register
位宽:16
作用:
说明: 
    1:0     LOADAMODE   [[CMPA]]数值加载模式
    3:2     LOADBMODE
    4       SHDWAMODE   [[CMPA]]运行模式
    5       resevered
    6       SHDWBMODE   [[CMPB]]运行模式
    7       resevered
    8       SHDWAFULL   [[CMPA]] [[Shadow Register]]满状态标志
    9       SHDWBFULL   [[CMPB]] [[Shadow Register]]满状态标志
    15:10   resevered
